dict.acceptation: 钟，铃；钟声，铃声；钟状物；[建]圆屋顶；
敲钟；系铃于，给…装上铃；使成铃状；把…放在钟形罩内；

sent.orig: Methods BAEP was determined in 61 patients with Bell palsy and 40 healthy subjects.
sent.trans: 方法对61例Bell麻痹患者进行BAEP检查，并以40名正常健康受试者作对照。

sent.orig: Over the years, I have reviewed many recorded hours of video involving Raja Bell.
sent.trans: 这些年来，我已经收到过很多有关Bell的录像。

sent.orig: Bell has a little bit of flat edge and evidence of dent removal.
sent.trans: Bell已一平力和清除凹痕点点的证据。

sent.orig: There is an agent in fast wireless bell call bell Zhejiang Jin Hua City? Where?
sent.trans: 迅铃无线呼叫铃浙江金华有代理商吗？在哪里？

sent.orig: Is that the first bell or the second bell?
